messages.subject: Holly reviews writing and intelligence
messages.msgSnippet: They type not very grammarifically. That was Holly, of some adult friends of hers who never punctuate and aren t particular about spelling.  Holly writes
messages.messageBody:
"They type not very grammarifically."

That was Holly, of some adult friends of hers who never punctuate and
aren't particular about spelling. Holly writes better than they do.
She didn't have the word "grammatically" at hand, maybe, or maybe
"grammarifically" stated exactly what she was feeling. :-)

A follow-up on a comment on someone we know with a PhD who is quite
clueless about a lot of things (mother of an ex boyfriend of hers).
"If you're not smart, all the school in the world won't make you smart."

Neither of these is important, just half funny and half profound.

Sandra
